entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Waskaganish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending this evening then partly cloudy. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
